channel.title: Earbuds Review on Wolfie
channel.description: Recent content in Earbuds Review on Wolfie

item.title: Airpods 1st Generation First Impressions
item.description: Airpods (Photo by PCMag) Hello guys! I have been trying out the Airpods 1st generation for around a week now, and I have a few things to say. Let’s get right into it! The Good The Airpods are really nice. The integration with my iPhone 7 is great because I get to use the battery widget. I also like the popup that appears that tells me the case battery percentage and the Airpods themselves.
